title: DojoManifest
description: Manifest file for a dojocho dojo (training package). Defines metadata, test command, and kata entries.

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor support.

description.description: Human-readable description of what this dojo teaches.

test.description: Shell command to run a kata's tests. Use {template} as placeholder for the kata file path.

katas.description: Ordered list of katas in this dojo.

homepage.description: URL to the dojo's homepage or documentation.

repository.description: URL or path to the dojo's source repository.

RunnerConfig.description: Configuration for the test runner adapter.

adapter.description: Test runner adapter. 'vitest' parses JSON output for per-test results. 'exit-code' uses exit code only (works with any test framework).

KataEntry.description: A single kata entry defining the template file and optional metadata.

template.description: Path to the kata's template file, relative to the dojo root.

test.description: Optional test command override for this specific kata. Replaces the top-level test command.

name.description: Explicit kata name. Falls back to the directory name derived from template path.

description.description: One-line summary of what this kata teaches.

prerequisites.description: Kata names that should be completed before this one.
